actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Trade Act of 1974 to improve the provision of trade readjustment allowances during breaks in training, and for other purposes.
short_title: Trade Adjustment Assistance Program Improvement Act of 1995

summary.text: Trade Adjustment Assistance Program Improvement Act of 1995 - Amends the Trade Act of 1974 to increase from 14 to 45 the number of days an adversely affected worker may have a scheduled break in a training program and still be treated as participating in the program for purposes of trade assistance adjustment eligibility.

titles.title: Trade Adjustment Assistance Program Improvement Act of 1995
A bill to amend the Trade Act of 1974 to improve the provision of trade readjustment allowances during breaks in training, and for other purposes.
